title: In the Five Hole
description: It was my big break, I was only 18 and I had just been called up to the big leagues! I was drafted onto the Montreal Citizens, the greatest hockey team of all time, and I was ready to show just how good I was. But my first meeting with the rough team captain didn't go as well as planned. He thinks I'm a cocky little hotshot and wants to put me in my place. But what if, deep down, that's what I really want?  Features: M/M, bdsm, bondage, spanking, anal, alpha male
author: Sam Shiver
